name: KoloryBox
description:
KoloryBox is a puzzle game from the category of those that have simple rules, but the victory does not come easily. The board consists of 9 cubes (at the beginning, on the next levels there are 16, 24 and even 36 cubes), whose colors you have to match. After tapping, each cube changes its color in a specific, predefined order (red-yellow-green-blue-violet). Matched (two or more) cubes are automatically picked up from the board. Your goal is obviously to clear the whole board of cubes. What are you waiting for? :) There are 500 levels to complete.

This is a PC/Mac port of the mobile game, available on App Store and Play Store.
